text.name: system_description
text.text: Solarus was specifically designed with cult 2D action-RPG classics in mind, such as The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past and Secret of Mana on the Super Nintendo, or Soleil on the Sega Megadrive/Genesis.

text.name: system_description
text.text: Solarus se diseñó específicamente teniendo en cuenta los clásicos de los juegos de rol de acción 2D, como The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past and Secret of Mana en Super Nintendo, o Soleil en Sega Megadrive / Genesis.

text.name: system_description
text.text: Solarus a été spécialement conçu pour les classiques 2D d'action-RPG cultes, tels que 'The Legend of Zelda: A Link to The Past' et 'Secret of Mana' sur Super Nintendo ou de 'Soleil' sur Sega Megadrive / Genesis.

text.name: system_description
text.text: Solarus foi projetado especificamente com clássicos cult de RPG de ação em 2D, como The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past and Secret of Mana no Super Nintendo, ou Soleil no Sega Megadrive / Genesis.
